explanations.Large Language Model: The paper evaluates and compares the diagnostic capabilities of large language models (LLMs) in otolaryngology, explicitly mentioning ChatGPT-3.5, Google Bard, and Bing-GPT4.
explanations.LLM: The study focuses on the performance of large language models (LLMs) in diagnosing medical conditions, which is the core subject of the research.
explanations.ChatGPT: The paper specifically tests and reports the diagnostic accuracy of ChatGPT-3.5, comparing it with other LLMs.
explanations.GPT-4: The study includes Bing-GPT4 in its comparison of LLMs, indicating relevance to GPT-4 technology.
